entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle near noon. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 15 except 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 15 except 10 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
